title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 410.1 - Preamble
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 410.1 - Preamble

State Regulations

Insureds, and in the case of a retrospective adverse determination, an insured's health care provider shall have the right to request an external appeal of a final adverse determination which is made by a health care plan on the grounds that the health care service is not medically necessary or is experimental or investigational. This Part shall be applicable to health care plans as defined in subdivision d-5 of section
4900
of the Insurance Law and to external appeal agents certified pursuant to title II of article 49 of the Insurance Law and Public Health Law and this Part and to applicants for certification as external appeal agents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
410.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
